answers.answer: Exactly how high is high. I am just getting into the diabetes thing as I was just diagnosed with pee-diabetes. Most likely they will give you a shot of insulin and get on you for eating so many carbs (which you knew not to eat that many anyway but sometimes we just gotta do it :).

If your blood sugar is in the low 200s or lower, drink heaps of water and don't eat that much carbs again.if your blood sugar was in the 300s or higher, I'd say go to the ER and get treated AND get referred to a dr to have further proper management.Very high blood sugar is dangerous!

question: is it silly to go to the ER to try and treat hyperglycemia when you are hypgerclyemia becuase of eating too many carbs? will they do anything for you?
title: hypergycemia
